mapper.select: select * from diner where diner_category_num = #{category} order by ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) limit #{startNum}, 20
mapper.insert: insert into diner(diner_file_code, diner_name, diner_address, diner_min_pay, diner_notice, diner_open_time, diner_close_time, diner_method_pay, diner_business_name, diner_company_num, diner_addr_point) value(#{diner_file_code}, #{diner_name}, #{diner_address}, #{diner_min_pay}, #{diner_notice}, #{diner_open_time}, #{diner_close_time}, #{diner_method_pay}, #{diner_business_name}, #{diner_company_num}, POINT(#{diner_addr_lng}, #{diner_addr_lat}))
